Welcome to ComplexNetworkSim's documentation!
=============================================

ComplexNetworkSim is a Python package for the simulation of agents 
connected in a complex network. 

Contents:
---------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   introduction
   installation
   start
   more
   
First official release (after development since October 2010): 28th August 2011

Last update of documentation: 29th August 2011
